name: Polar bear (StarOne BoomBoom, Beks, Godard Gilles)
name_original: Polar bear (StarOne BoomBoom, Beks, Godard Gilles)
description:
This is an exploration game with an icy atmosphere in which you will play as a polar bear browsing through lost memories.

Hope you will enjoy it !

Controller : just walk around with your joystick :3 or you can use the directional arrows on your keyboard

This game was created following a game dev training organized by Technifutur and produced by Benjamin Delmal, Maxime Beco and Gilles Godard.

Benjamin Delmal : 3D, 2D artist and artistic direction

Maxime Beco: Development, FX and integration

Gilles Godard: 3D artist, integration and hapiness manager

To join us
